# www.relific.io llms.txt

> Offering technology-driven solutions for education, healthcare, sustainability, and social development — focusing on impact measurement, real-time data collection, and AI-driven decision-making to improve outcomes and empower underserved communities.

- [Impact Intelligence Solutions](https://www.relific.io): To offer technology-driven solutions for impact measurement and improvement across various sectors including agriculture, education, and healthcare.

## Core Content Sections

### [Products]   

- [Drive_R / Impact Intelligence](https://www.relific.io/drive_r): The core AI‑powered impact intelligence solution of Relific.  
  This page introduces Relific’s integrated SaaS for measuring and transforming social impact across sectors such as agriculture, education, healthcare, sustainability, grant management, and livelihood development.  

- [Surve_R / AI-enabled Data Collection](https://www.relific.io/surve_r): This page presents Relific’s AI‑powered impact intelligence platform, especially emphasizing the survey, analytics, and data measurement capabilities across sectors.  

- [ProGran / Programme Analytics & Monitoring](https://www.relific.io/progran): Relific’s dedicated solution for grant and program management, designed to help NGOs, CSR teams, and social sector organizations plan, track, and report on grants and programs efficiently.  

  
### [About Us]  

- [Organizations We Serve](https://www.relific.io/whoweserve): We provide tailored technology solutions for NGOs, CSR initiatives, and social sector consultants to maximize impact, streamline operations, and drive positive change.

- [About Us](https://www.relific.io/aboutus): Relific empowers organizations with smart digital solutions to enhance efficiency, collaboration, and impact across industries.


## [Resources]

- [Blogs](https://www.relific.io/blogs): Our blogs share insights, field stories, and real-world impact from our journey in social innovation and community development.
